fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may choose to scramble everyone's attributes
- You may choose to swap two players' positions on the rolelist
- You may rotate the town, causing all attack and defense values to invert

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- May only spawn via reroll
- If you got rerolled into a shittier role, have a 50% chance to spawn as this.
